profile.name: Kent C. Dodds
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Cloud-First Developer | Salt Lake City, Utah
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong focus on cloud-first development. Proficient in TypeScript and JavaScript, with expertise in CI/CD pipelines and open-source project management.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @epicweb-dev
description: Developed and maintained cloud-native applications using Cloudflare-related technologies, including cloudflare-fastmcp and agents.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployment and testing.
Provided code reviews and feedback to ensure high-quality software delivery.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to various open-source projects, including cloudflare-fastmcp and agents.
Developed and maintained multiple web applications using TypeScript and JavaScript.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated cloudflare-fastmcp, a popular open-source project.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve the overall quality of the project.

experience.title: Cloudflare Engineer
description: Developed and implemented cloud-native applications using Cloudflare-related technologies.
Worked closely with the Cloudflare team to ensure seamless integration of their services.
